column2: Bot.%9: 503%1867 [23 Aug 1867]%nom. illeg. later homonym    non Nees (1832)%.Anderson (p. 445; dated 6 Apr 1866) provided a description for Haplanthus Nees (1832). Within its treatment
column3: he (pp. 503-504) included 4 species; at the same time
column4: he (p. 502) excluded the genus type species H. tener Nees and treated it as a synonym of Andrographis tenuiflora T.Anderson. Thus "Haplanthus T.Anderson" was inadvertently created as a later homonym in 1867 (see Melbourne Code Art. 48.1)%%%%%tax. nov.
